blogPost.title: Samvera Connect 2025: Explore the Full Program & Save with Early Bird Registration

content.value: is now live! Join us in Mexico City this October for four days of learning, sharing, and connecting with the Samvera community.
A half-day of workshops to kick things off
Two days of plenary sessions featuring participants from across the community
Keynote address from a leading Latin American repository expert (details coming soon)
Repository Showcases and lightning talks highlighting real-world projects
Interest & Working Group roundtables plus dedicated networking time
Tuesday evening reception to relax and connect
Flexible final half-day with unconference sessions, a Partner meeting, and a developer meet-up
Early bird registration is only $200 through September 6.
See the full schedule, review all the details, and
register today at the Samvera Connect 2025 website.
We can’t wait to see you in Mexico City!

openGraphData.og:description: Samvera™ is a vibrant and welcoming community of information and technology professionals who share challenges, build expertise, and create sustainable, best-in-class solutions, making the world’s digital collections accessible now and into the future. Samvera’s suite of repository software tools offers flexible and rich user interfaces tailored to distinct content types on top of a robust back end – giving adopters the best of both worlds.
